General.Name: Giga Metals Corp
General.Description: Giga Metals Corporation engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for nickel and cobalt sulphide deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Turnagain property with 75 contiguous mineral claims covering an area of approximately 40,069 hectares located in the Liard mining division of northern British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Hard Creek Nickel Corporation and changed its name to Giga Metals Corporation in August 2017. Giga Metals Corporation was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 700 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1G8
